content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    lines = split(md, '\n')
    code_blocks = []
    
    in_code_block = false
    for line in lines
        if startswith(line, "```julia") || 
           startswith(line, "```jl")
            in_code_block = !in_code_block
            continue
        end
        
        if in_code_block
            push!(code_blocks, replace(line, "```" => "")))
        end
    end
    
    return join(code_blocks, '\n')
end
```
This function `extract_julia_code` takes a markdown document as input and returns a string containing all the Julia code blocks, with code fences removed and multiple code blocks joined by newlines.
